abstract: The maximum resolution of the requested photo.
overview:
## Discussion

Set a value for this property to request images up to the specified dimensions. Images that a photo output returns may be smaller than the dimensions, but are never be larger. Once set, you can request images with any valid maximum photo dimensions by setting [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/maxPhotoDimensions] on [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings] on a per photo basis.

The dimensions you set must match one returned by [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/Format/supportedMaxPhotoDimensions] for the current active format.

# maxPhotoDimensions

**Instance Property**

The maximum resolution of the requested photo.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxPhotoDimensions: CMVideoDimensions { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set a value for this property to request images up to the specified dimensions. Images that a photo output returns may be smaller than the dimensions, but are never be larger. Once set, you can request images with any valid maximum photo dimensions by setting [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/maxPhotoDimensions] on [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings] on a per photo basis.

The dimensions you set must match one returned by [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/Format/supportedMaxPhotoDimensions] for the current active format.
title: maxPhotoDimensions
